title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 86 - General Exhibits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 86 - General Exhibits

State Regulations
§ 86.1 - General requirements
§ 86.2 - Exhibit 1: general information regarding application
§ 86.3 - Exhibit 2: location of facilities
§ 86.4 - Exhibit 3: alternatives
§ 86.5 - Exhibit 4: environmental impact
§ 86.6 - Exhibit 5: design drawings
§ 86.7 - Exhibit 6: economic effects of proposed facility
§ 86.8 - Exhibit 7: local ordinances
§ 86.9 - Exhibit 8: other pending filings
§ 86.10 - Exhibit 9: cost of proposed facility

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 86

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 20[1], 122[1][f], art. VII
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
